base_units¶

Basic Units, multi-physical base model

Functions

bound_profile(m, t[, flow_name, index_name, …]) Method for bounding a variable to given dynamic profiles.
fix_profile(m[, flow_name, index_name, …]) Method for fixing a variable to a given dynamic profile.
set_profile(profile[, kind, fill_value]) DEPRECIATED Generates constraint functions used to set bounds and values of profiles

Classes

Abs(*args, time[, xmax, xmin]) DEPRECIATED Absolute Value
AbsDynUnit(*args, **kwds)

AbsFlowSource(*args[, flow_name]) Abstract Flow Source Unit.

DynUnitTest(*args[, time]) Dynamic Test Unit

FlowSource(*args, time, profile[, kind, …]) DEPRECIATED Base Flow Source Unit.
